main event: A UFO was observed on April 7, 1950, moving silently across the horizon in a tall silhouette shape.
interesting points: The object was reported to be three times bigger than Venus,The sighting lasted only 3 seconds,It was described as having a craft-type appearance,Radio interference was noted during the observation,The conclusion of the sighting was that it was likely a balloon.
sighted object: an object with a tall silhouette shape
